attributes.action: Hold a Referendum on re-joining the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The Tory government failed in its basic duty knowingly, it also knowingly lied in its campaign and published false statements. 

Brexit is destroying the very fabric of UK trade, business, social harmony, prosperity and freedom.

Do what’s right take us back into the EU and give us a voice once again in Europe.
attributes.background: Brexit is the biggest disaster any government has ever negotiated.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold a referendum on re-joining the EU on previous terms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609420
